name: Password Reset Request
description: Used to submit a password reset request for a specific userName. Before resetting a secondary confirmation is completed.

attributes.name: userName
attributes.description: A string value that matches the service provider unique identifier for the user.

attributes.name: challenges
attributes.description: A Complex attribute describing challenge questions and responses that match the values found in the resource matched by the userName attribute.

subAttributes.name: question
subAttributes.description: A String that represents a challenge question for which the corresponding response is defined.

subAttributes.name: response
subAttributes.description: A String that represents the subjects specified correct response to the corresponding challenge.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: A string value for the requested password. When specified, the challenges attribute must also be present.
